title: Krichevsky–Trofimov estimator
summary: In information theory, given an unknown stationary source π with alphabet A and a sample w from π, the Krichevsky–Trofimov (KT) estimator produces an estimate pi(w) of the probability of each symbol i ∈ A. This estimator is optimal in the sense that it minimizes the worst-case regret asymptotically.
